trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 비교 연산자를 사용 하 여 지정된 된 값을 활동 멤버의 값을 비교 하는 조건을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] You can use an ActivityTrackingCondition to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>나 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> 제한 하는 ActivityTrackingCondition를 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> 기본 생성자를 사용 하는 경우 명시적으로 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> 설정 해야

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: 기본값 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>은 `Equals`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"> </xref> 활동 멤버 및 비교할 값을 지정 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>로 설정 되어 `member`, 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>로 설정 된 `value`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: 기본값 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>은 `Equals`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of an activity member.
trans-unit.target: 점으로 활동 멤버의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value to be compared
trans-unit.target: 비교할 값

trans-unit.source: member is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: member가 null 참조 ( Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*> 와 비교할 활동 멤버의 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 활동 속성이 나 필드, 활동 속성이 나 필드의 멤버 또는 구현 하는 작업 속성 또는 필드 (또는 그룹의 멤버)의 단일 요소를 지정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 컬렉션의 단일 요소를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Member.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 기본 생성자를 사용 하는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, 멤버를 명시적으로 설정 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 활동 멤버의 값은 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 적용 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> 와 비교

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member
trans-unit.target: 점으로 구분 된 활동 멤버의 이름

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 조건이 평가 및 멤버는 null 참조 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 평가 하 고 멤버 잘못 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and Member does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: 조건이 평가 하 고 멤버 올바른 활동 멤버를 참조 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 비교에 사용 되는 연산자를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
trans-unit.target: 현재 지원 `Equals` 및 `NotEquals`합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Equals" name="Equals" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Equals" name="Equals" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*> 와 비교 되는 값

trans-unit.source: Value is compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> 적용 하 여</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> 의 값과 비교

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Value.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 기본 생성자를 사용 하는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, 값을 명시적으로 설정 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: The value used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 비교에 사용 되는 값입니다.
